sentences.en: Apply solution to the tube and allow to become tacky.
sentences.cn: 在内胎上涂抹胶水并让它发粘.

sentences.en: Are there tacky roller clean machines in front of the laminator?
sentences.cn: 在压膜前是否有粘尘滚轮清洁机器?

sentences.en: As the rubber droplets lose the acetone solvent, they become tacky and agglomerate.
sentences.cn: 当橡胶滴失去丙酮溶液后, 变成粘的,聚集态的.

sentences.en: Christ, she looks so old, so tacky.
sentences.cn: 老天, 她看上去又老又俗气.

sentences.en: He always throws out the tacky comment and the cheap shot. He has no class.
sentences.cn: 他动辄便揶揄挖苦一番——这个人不上档次。

sentences.en: In general, fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky.
sentences.cn: 通常潮湿和粘性的微细颗粒易于聚集和结块.

sentences.en: It's a tacky, nasty little movie, frankly.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说,那是一部低级下流 、 微不足道的影片.

sentences.en: Oh, spare me your remarks about her poverty and her tacky clothes.
sentences.cn: 唔, 求求你不要在我面前诉说她的贫穷和褴褛了.

sentences.en: She looks really tacky in that dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿那件衣服看起来俗不可耐.

sentences.en: The movie had a really tacky ending.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的结尾真差劲。

sentences.en: The whole thing is dreadfully tacky.
Then I'll have to wear tacky old grays and tans and lilacs. "
sentences.cn: 那么,我就只能穿倒霉的老灰色,穿褐色和淡紫色了.

sentences.en: They spread a lot of tacky gossip about his love life.
sentences.cn: 关于他的爱情生活,他们散播了许多不堪的闲言闲语.

sentences.en: This is sort of tacky gift for a birthday.
sentences.cn: 这个生日礼物有点俗气.

words.tran_cn: 大头钉；粗缝；行动方针；食物
固定住；暂时缝上；附加；改变航向（tack的ing形式）
抢风航行；作文字形移动
俗气的；发黏的；缺乏教养或风度的

trans.tran_cn: 发黏的，俗气的，褴褛的，缺乏教养或风度的
